First time talking: I sure hope you're not here to arrest me. I'm just an outside contractor.
As long as you pay your taxes, I don't care who you are.
In that case, I'm called Patchwork Gary. I sell access to arcane powers in the form of magical patches.
Would you be interested in purchasing some?
Hello there! I see those fools with hammers haven't managed to squash you yet.
I have some interesting patches if you're in the market for 'em. Care to take a look?
